title: Should I take the CBSE improvement exam as I have 78.6% in 12 in 2020 and preparing for the JEE? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: If you are preparing only for JEE,writing improvents is waste instead you can prepare for main or advanced. But if you are preparing for exams like EAMCET also, its better to do As in JEE you just need 75% in boards But in EAMCET and some exams they see boards marks too 😊
